== Mangalpady (CT) (627126) ==

Mangalpady (CT) is a town in the [[Kasaragod]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 8.23 sq. km. and harbouring 2432 households with total population of 12790 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 550 km. Male population is 6209 and female population is 6581. Scheduled Caste population is 776 and Scheduled Tribes population is 62. Census Location Code of the town is 627126<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Mangalore(m corp. + og) at a distance of 30 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 200 km. Railway station is at Uppala at a distance of 2 km.
